title: The mysterious Russian airlift helping Syria's Assad
text:
The mysterious Russian airlift helping Syria's Assad 7:14am EDT - 02:03 
''We're not allowed to say anything,'' warned the Russian mercenary after exiting an unlisted flight from Damascus. ''Any minute the boss will come and we'll get in trouble. You, too.''   
"We're not allowed to say anything," warned the Russian mercenary after exiting an unlisted flight from Damascus. "Any minute the boss will come and we'll get in trouble. You, too."  //reut.rs/2Hf8zSG
